required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy Study on Dimethyl Fumarate to Treat Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Double Blind, Double Dummy, Active Comparator and Placebo Controlled Confirmative Non-inferiority Trial of FP187 Compared to Fumaderm® in Moderate to Severe Plaque Psoriasis

brief_summary.textblock: This multicenter, randomised, double-dummy, Fumaderm® and placebo-controlled, parallel-group study will compare the efficacy and safety of 500 mg of FP187 (250 mg twice daily) compared to 720 mg Fumaderm® (240 mg three times daily) over 20 weeks of treatment. After an initial wash-out non-drug treatment phase of 1 to 6 weeks, all patients will receive allocated Study treatment up-titrated to the relevant dose level (i.e., 500 mg daily FP187, 720 mg daily Fumaderm®, or placebo). The up-titration to full dose will last 4 weeks for FP187 and 9 weeks for Fumaderm®. After 20 weeks of treatment, all patients will be asked to enter a separate open label treatment protocol expected to continue for up to 5 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of patients achieving a 75% reduction in their Psoriasis Area and Severity Index (PASI75) score from baseline
Responder rate of Static Physician's Global Assessment (sPGA)
primary_outcome.description: Achieving a score of clear or almost clear or a 2 step improvement on a 6-point scale as compared to baseline.

arm_group.description: 500 mg FP187 daily (250 mg twice daily)
720 mg Fumaderm® daily (240 mg three times daily)

intervention.description: 500 mg FP187 daily, two tablets of 125 mg twice daily, from 125 mg daily up-titrated to full dose over a 4-week phase, total treatment phase of 20 weeks
720 mg Fumaderm® daily, two tablets of 120 mg three times daily, from 30 mg daily up-titrated to full dose over a 9-week phase, total treatment phase of 20 weeks
FP187 matching placebo tablets in the same regimen as for FP187 arm
Fumaderm® matching placebo tablets in the same regimen as for Fumaderm® arm
